articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: TikTok now lets users send voice notes and images in DMs - TechCrunch
articles.description: The new capabilities bring TikTok’s messaging experience more in line with that of other popular social apps and services.
articles.content: TikTok is giving users new ways to interact with others via direct messages (DMs), the company told TechCrunch on Friday. Users will now be able to send voice notes and share up to nine images or vid… [+2442 chars]
